thread.title: BRIEF-Engility Awarded $76 Mln In Contracts To Engineer And Secure Intelligence Systems

title: BRIEF-Engility Awarded $76 Mln In Contracts To Engineer And Secure Intelligence Systems

organizations.name: ntelligence systems reuters staff    engility holdings inc

text:
35 AM / Updated 22 minutes ago BRIEF-Engility Awarded $76 Mln In Contracts To Engineer And Secure Intelligence Systems Reuters Staff 
  Engility Holdings Inc: 
* ENGILITY AWARDED $76 MILLION IN CONTRACTS TO ENGINEER AND SECURE INTELLIGENCE SYSTEMS 
* ENGILITY HOLDINGS INC - WON THREE SOLE-SOURCE AWARDS WITH U.S. INTELLIGENCE COMMUNITY IN Q1 OF 2018, TOTALING $76 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
